name: First New England Capital
overview: First New England Capital (FNEC) provides debt and equity financing to privately-held small and medium size businesses throughout the United States. Since its inception in 1988, the firm has invested approximately $100 million in over 60 companies in a broad range of industries. FNEC manages a pool of capital in excess of $120 million, comprised on three funds, each of which is licensed as a Small Business Investment Company under the Small Business Investment Act of 1958.
